#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

A brief summary of what you have to do in order to set up a proper development environment and run the project.


= Steps =
 
  * Install Eclipse
  * Install the [http://developer.android.com/sdk/installing.html Android SDK], the eclipse ADT plugin and [http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/device.html USB-drivers] for your android phone (or create an [http://developer.android.com/guide/developing/devices/index.html Android Virtual Device] to run the project in the emulator).
  * Use svn to checkout the project (for example the eclipse subclipse plugin)
  * (connect your android phone to the computer)
  * Run as Android Application.
